showerReviews.reviewText: Probably the worst shower at a truck stop I‚Äôve ever had.  There was no water pressure.  At one point I thought it was just going to shut off in the middle of showering.  It was more like a $10-$12 dollar shower not $18. They had a clearance ‚Ä¶

Great place plenty parking very nice ppl. But that sink the floor the shower had not been cleaned before it was given to me. Thank GOD I wear shower shoes! I told the young man working the truck desk when I finished he said say something ‚Ä¶

17 dollars for a dirty shower and low water pressure luke warm water. Assistant manager did not care brushed it off. Has to be in the top 20 worst loves. But I got the over priced shower that I needed
‚Ä¶ I did not take a shower here it looks like they're remodeling still on their showers but when they're done I'm sure the showers are look as nice as the rest of store. ‚Ä¶
Below standard tiny little showers. Shower head leaks, blown light bulb inside shower, empty soap inside shower. You can see the staff dont care

Showers were clean but water was cold with no pressure and shower room was ice cold. Don't pull in here thinking you're going to get a decent shower. The little town of LeRoy was fairly nice. You can walk to a diner and a few other places. ‚Ä¶

Stopped here to do a 10 break and be able to grab a shower and the doors were locked with signs saying sorry we are closed till 6 am. Seriously management every other loves nationwide is open 24/7 loves corporate should seriously find ‚Ä¶

Stopped at the Love's in Leroy ,Illinois to grab a shower and unfortunately the water was cold. I reported it to the staff and they were very apologetic and addressed the problem immediately to resolve it. They were very courteous and gave ‚Ä¶

Clean store and shower,  friendly staff but the shower water dose not get got at all,  at best luke cool with a small hit of warmth,  and i kept losing my water pressure. I can somewhat understand doin high volume times but this is not the ‚Ä¶
They had three fuel pumps down it's a new store showers were real tiny that's why they don't give five stars cuz I kept bumping into the wall while trying to shower

showerReviews.reviewText: For $18 dollars a shower I think they should be immaculate clean. I mean; that‚Äôs 1/3 of the price of a good hotel in which you would be using all the services for a whole day, here I am just using the shower one time for 15 minutes, so I ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ I've been to some pretty nasty TA's and truck stops. Came here for a break and a shower, the first shower was dirty and had used dirty rags in the shower, dead gnats all over the walls. Asked for a new shower, second shower but just as ‚Ä¶

Walked down to pilot to shower instead of this t/a didn't even ask for a shower walked in to use the restroom and it smelled like it hasn't every been cleaned. Did laundry went to the drivers lounge and the TV didn't even work with all the ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ but the facilities are horrible. What is that money going towards cause they definitely aren't putting it back into the stores. The shower was okay. I must've caught them after they cleaned because it wasn't bad. I wish they'd invest in the ‚Ä¶
Shower rooms were spotless. Warm towels. A few hot cold food options. Own restaurant. But reserved parking too expensive. 24 bucks. If you don‚Äôt fuel   Or have rewards.

The brother taking care of the showers is banging on doors while your in the shower taking about his shower line is getting backed up.  Lol. I have never had someone go up and down the hall banging on doors.  On top of that this location ‚Ä¶

My husband and I took our reset here. We had our truck serviced, did laundry, showered, and had 3 meals in the restaurant. Everything was great, quick service, hot shower and clean facilities. The area is quiet and there is plenty of nice ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ who have never figured out what that 70' space is for in front of the fuel island, and the ones who take a shower, eat,and do a little shopping while parked on the fuel island, and probably didn't even buy fuel.. but, hey, they're ‚Ä¶

Ask for a handicap shower like we have gotten several times before there bc I only have one leg. Got a shower that I had to drag the beach in to sit on which wasn't a problem the shower had NO HAND RAILS AT ALL NONE I had NOTHING to hold ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ our son up from a training at great lakes naval base near Chicago and planned on a 25 hour drive to meet family.  Little did we know, the training was intense up to the last day and our son didn't get to take a shower prior to graduation. ‚Ä¶

Truckers, pay attention to all of the recent reviews. Showers need some major attention. Black mold throughout the shower and there's also water spots everywhere which leads me to believe that it wasn't properly clean. I personally wouldn't ‚Ä¶

Under staffed on 6/22/25. 2:00 AM. No clean showers and waiting almost two hours. 1:17AM setup text alerts on iPhone to notify when shower will be available‚Ä¶.  2:53 AM no text notification received as of yet.  Sharing to help others. Asked ‚Ä¶

You absolutely WILL NOT get a hot shower at this location. The manager at this location flat-out refuses to turn up the water heater.  For the last 8 weeks I have stopped here every two days for a shower. Every single time the water is ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ out and I end up standing there for 15 minutes and still nothing but cold Arctic water. so I go back to where the showers are and I noticed there are three open showers and there's a guy cleaning one of them, it looks like he just started. ‚Ä¶

A dump. Dropped trailers taking up spots, trucks parked in No Parking/ Fire Lanes, surly employees, self-serve everything, forever waiting for a shower. Gave up after waiting nearly two hours. Never stopping here again.

Was told via app for showers I was next came in waited in driver lounge for 20 minutes then the app updated and said I had 1 person ahead of me?!?! Went to ask what's going on and apparently they have no clean towels and no access to app ‚Ä¶
Stopped for a drink and a shower, girl moved me from her cash over to self checkout,  then was informed the showers were not available, will never stop here again

Words can not explain my thoughts properly. I‚Äôve tried not to leave a post about this place showers but I‚Äôve been here 5 different times and it never fells. They truly don‚Äôt clean these showers. I‚Äôm not sure what nasty drive cut there nails ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ this place or I would have skipped it if it weren't for lack of drive time. 9pm place isn't very busy at all. I go to get a shower. I am then told it's going to be at least a two hour wait if not more before an extra person shows up to ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ burgers pizza hotdogs tornados the sausage French toast ones are fire always clean place and the bathrooms are always nice and well stocked they even have showers if ya need a shower always busy and any trucker needs ya have they got ya

It's a Thornton turned pilot. Can't reserve a shower because they don't have electronic locks. Showers were clean.
Service was fast an excellent place for a shower an camp out.
Always stop here for a shower on my way to Chicago.  Friendly staff.

locations.title: Iowa 80 - The World's Largest Truckstop
locations.content: Iowa 80 - The World's Largest Truckstop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ We spent the night in the RV lot after seeking shelter from dangerous winds & possible severe t-storms. We were able to do laundry & shower,  All very clean.  The laundry was very clean & reasonably priced... would definitely recommend! A ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ has many hidden amenities.  A great place for everyone but especially for truckers, and long haulers, as they have laundry and shower facilities as well as a dentist, barber, work out facilities and so much more! We love stopping on our ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ entertainment. There‚Äôs a huge convenience store for your snack needs and a diner that serves both menu items and a buffet. Didn‚Äôt get a shower there but the restrooms were clean. The place has 3 floors that includes a barber. There‚Äôs also ‚Ä¶

Pretty big with lots to do. Has a shower area. Tons of restaurants. Stuff for kids to explore and see. Has a chiropractor on site. This place has leveled up in the last few years by adding tons of stuff. ‚Ä¶

Hadn't been here in years. Went to take a shower on Palm Sunday and Pastor Daryl was giving a sermon in the lounge in front of the showers. The Lord told me to stay. Was warm & friendly service. Then I met with the pastor for 4 hours that ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ of necessities and snacks. Spend some time wandering around the main store area, there's plenty to see. Clean restrooms and shower. Navigate through the various gift shops located throughout the facility. You can also get customized ‚Ä¶

World‚Äôs biggest truck stop. Besides truck parking which can park 900 trucks you have a restaurant, theatre, shower rooms, lounge, convince stores. Its is spread in 75 acres. If I am not wrong you can park here for free. It has fuel station ‚Ä¶

This place is huge. There‚Äôs a food court inside the truck stop. Upstairs there are dentist, chiropractor, shower, laundry, hair salon. And the truck section of stuff takes up half of the place. Parking was no problem. There‚Äôs also tesla ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ You can take a shower, get a haircut, and watch a movie. There's even a dentist and a chiropractor. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ and friendly service here you can buy too much trick stuff from here lights bumper fittings hoses etc. little price higher Coustmer service very good here i love this location shower also very clean and too much like more than 25 may be

Same shower issue as many fuel stops-none available although none are in use. All are dirty because its more efficient for them to clean showers all at once and you...CAN WAIT!  I have news for you, it's not my duty to wait on you,  im a ‚Ä¶

This is a truck stop right? Can someone explain why the toilet seats look like this in the actual bathroom the public uses but not in the shower room that truckers use to shower???? What is really going on? I don't even feel comfortable ‚Ä¶

I was very worried about showering here but I really needed one. They have showers ! They were clean. Staff was kind and helpful. Water took almost 3 min. to get hot but it did ! I guess they fixed their issues. Go ahead and shower. Its Ok ‚Ä¶

Tried to get a shower was told none was clean and it's going to be awhile before they can clean them wasn't that busy when I got there the two workers were talking eating and walking around waited 10 minutes asked if I couldn't buy one ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ Also prepare to be treated rudely. Every time I come here And try to grab a shower or get a scale ticket the attendants attitude changes. I've never just gotten into a shower, I'm always made to wait, all while looking at open showers. Usu ‚Ä¶

Come in at 6:53 pm to shower and the rude lady behind the counter said sorry I‚Äôm by myself and can‚Äôt clean the showers so sorry now after I just paid $1000 in fuel spent another $27 in the store and all she was worried about is the motoring ‚Ä¶
